Title: Rage in Heaven
Writer: Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Russel Friend, Garrett Lerner, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (novel)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: After a devastating rampage, Kovacs and his allies hatch a bold - and very risky - scheme to infiltrate Head in the Clouds.
